name: Code FP (working title)
description:
This was an idea I was tinkering with for a while. I have a small stack of floppy disks and I thought it would be interesting to make something with them.

This is a digital escape room, where given the files you are trying to get to the END. 

Trying to gauge interest to see if more people want it. 

Puzzle 001: This one is lightly Halloween themed.
